sentence.Network_en: Aladag is an Iguanodon, living in a paradise - like island.
sentence.Network_cn: 阿拉达是一头禽龙, 生活在一个世外桃源般的小岛上.

sentence.Network_en: Iguanodon was a plant eater. Other meat eating dinosaurs would kill the Iguanodon to eat it.
sentence.Network_cn: 禽龙是草食动物. 其它食肉恐龙会捕食禽龙.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...碎和碾压较硬的食物。现生鸟类的胃有强壮有力的肌肉囊袋，吃下去的食物经过胃部肌肉的运动，使存在胃里的石块互相摩擦，把食物碾碎成粘稠的浆糊状。胃石成了对付粗糙食物最有效的工具。像很多鸟脚龙类恐龙，如鸭嘴龙（hadrosaurus）、禽龙（iguanodon）等吞噬大量植物的恐龙，也是靠此来消化大量食物.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from iguana + Greek odous, odont- 'tooth' (because its teeth resemble those of the iguana)

means.word_mean: 1. massive herbivorous bipedal dinosaur with a long heavy tail; common in Europe and northern Africa; early Cretaceous period

auth_sentence.content: Isolated injuries have been reported in Camptosaurus, Iguanodon, Deinonychus and Syntarsus.
auth_sentence.res_content: Isolated injuries have been reported in Camptosaurus, Iguanodon, Deinonychus and Syntarsus.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Isolated injuries have been reported in Camptosaurus, Iguanodon, Deinonychus and Syntarsus.

auth_sentence.content: Scientific understanding of Iguanodon has evolved over time as new information has been obtained from fossils.
auth_sentence.res_content: Scientific understanding of Iguanodon has evolved over time as new information has been obtained from fossils.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Scientific understanding of Iguanodon has evolved over time as new information has been obtained from fossils.

auth_sentence.content: The genus Iguanodon belongs to the larger group Iguanodontia, along with the duck-billed hadrosaurs.
auth_sentence.res_content: The genus Iguanodon belongs to the larger group Iguanodontia, along with the duck-billed hadrosaurs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The genus Iguanodon belongs to the larger group Iguanodontia, along with the duck-billed hadrosaurs.
